name: Only Golf
description:
Only Golf is a challenging golf game that puts players' skills to the test.

The game features a series of increasingly difficult levels, each with its own unique set of challenges and obstacles. In Only Golf, the objective is simple: hit the ball into the hole. However, the game is not that simple, as player must take into account the direction of the wind and adjust their shot accordingly. If the wind is blowing in the wrong direction, the ball may go too far or too slowly, making it difficult to hit the hole.

Only Golf is the perfect game for anyone who loves golf or enjoys a good challenge. With its intuitive gameplay, challenging levels, and stunning visuals, this game is sure to provide hours of entertainment for players of all ages. So, grab your clubs, adjust for the wind, and get ready to become a golfing master in Only Golf!

Game Features :
- Golf rules
- Showed wind direction
- 5 strokes per attempt
- Multiple levels
